summary: a text file to add everything you need in order to make any item through smithing or alchemy in vanilla skyrim including crimson nirnroot
descriptionHtml:
i dont know how to mod really so i just thought i\'d do something simple but kinda annoying to do that makes playing the game a lot easier for those that like to make items, but hate the long process of getting them through legitimate ways or with console.

This txt file basically inputs console commands to add 1000 of all vanilla crafting materials including leather, leather strips, Gems(flawed to flawless), ingots, and alchemy ingredients(crimson nirnroot is included, which will start a quest if it\'s in your inventory as long as you haven\'t gotten the quest beforehand)

contains: 2 text files
mats: adds the items to the target that does NOT modify maximum carryweight
mats2: adds the items directly into the player and modifies the carryweight so the player wont be overencombered.

--------------------
Instructions
--------------------

mats

1. place the .txt file in skyrim folder or the data folder
2. start the game
3. open up your console(press `)
4. target a container(just click on anything that can hold items WARNING: this file adds 39100 weight\'s worth of items into the target and does not modify the target\'s maximum carryweight so i\'d advise you target a chest near alchemy/smithing stations)
5. type in \"bat mats\" without the quotation marks.
6. get the items from the container you chose

mats2(adds directly into the player character, and mods carryweight 40000)

1. place the .txt file in skyrim folder or the data folder
2. start the game
3. open up your console(press `)
4. type in \"bat mats2\" without the quotation marks.
author: yoo203
